name: Super Robot Taisen Gaiden - Masou Kishin - The Lord of Elemental [SNES]
description:
Super Robot Taisen OG Saga: Masou Kishin III - Pride of Justice is a strategy game developed by Banpresto. It came out on 22-08-2013. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
Super Robot Taisen OG Saga: Masou Kishin III - Pride of Justice is available on PlayStation 3 and PS Vita.
